Package org.logevents.observers

Class LogEventBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.logevents.observers.LogEventBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogEventObserver, LogEventSource
    public class LogEventBuffer
extends Object
implements LogEventObserver, LogEventSource
    In-memory implementation of LogEventSource to be used with WebLogEventObserver
